name: Dental Dosh
description:
Dental Dosh
Your teeth are made of Gold!!

Strategy style game where you use teeth as money to buy towers. Enemies who reach  the end take teeth from you.
You are trying to defend your mouth from oncoming enemies - plaque, bacteria and ulcers. You start each level with a certain amount of TEETH. Use the teeth wisely by building tooth towers. 

Controls
Gamepad
Analog
A to interact

Keyboard/Mouse

Arrows
X to interact /Enter to select/LeftClick
